column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Everything on the menu sounded delicious. After narrowing it down to 4.. I finally decided to go with the short rib chilaquiles
column2: as recommended by our bartender. And I was completely satisfied and happy. The short rib was flavorful and tender
column4: the crunchy corn tortilla with chile and cheese added the perfect texture. The portion size is good for the price - I was super stuffed and didn't get hungry again until late in the night!
